c74object.name: tap.folder
c74object.description: Use tap.folder as a cross-platform way to create, delete, and copy folders.

method.name: make
method.description: Create a new folder with the specified name.

method.name: delete
method.description: Delete a folder with the specified name. Be extremely careful with the use of this method!!! It can result in the permanent loss of data.

method.name: copy
method.description: Copy a folder with the name specified for the first arg to a new folder with the name specified with the second arg.

method.name: zip
method.description: This Mac-only method creates a zip file from the folder specified as an argument.
